title: Anatomy of a teenage marriage
brief_description: After five months of marriage, Dave and Vickie find that married life isn’t what they expected it to be. Suffering from boredom, frustration and problems of immaturity, they begin to realize that they must both make important changes to save their marriage. Second edition of “Marriage is a partnership”. No other credits available.
